div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 219 Chalcis environs, Euboea, 1937 (233a) Burial: early 2nd cent. B.C. ? (T) Contents: 74 AE Larissa: 2 Chalcis: 55 (as BMC pl. 20, 17) Eretria: 17 (as BMC pl. 17, 14 but with ΕΥΒΟΙΕΟΝ) Disposition: unknown Noe records on the basis of information from an Athenian correspondent. The pertinent material is not in the ANS
